name: City Theft Grand Bank Robbery
description: In a mad city of crime, robbing a bank is the first job that comes to mind of a notorious mafia criminals. Enjoy the most thrilling grand bank robbery missions in this extremely action packed game. Play as a robbers against bank guards to execute city grand bank theft. Be the skilled robber and get out from dangerous crime scene. Drive crazy, smash and hit the police cars. Grab your gun, shoot at them and keep running to escape. Finally robber will manage to successfully escape from chasing police and Mission Complete! Experience the newest addition of bank robbery crime simulator and live the life of an adventurous robber in City Theft Grand Bank Robbery!
